name: Petilil

evolution.description: Petilil can evolve into Lilligant at level 6 and above, with the help of a Sun Stone. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 15 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Bulb Pokémon. Since they prefer moist, nutrient-rich soil, the areas where Petilil live are known to be good for growing plants.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: This Pokémon’s speed is doubled in harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to becoming confused.

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.description: This Pokémon does not suffer from any negative status ailments in harsh sunlight.
